description:
Gluwacoin is a cryptographic token standard. Gluwacoin Token is a fiat-backed stablecoin. By referencing existing financial networks, Gluwacoin is designed as an interoperable meta-network that connects multiple blockchains.
Gluwacoin’s exchange functions connect it to other blockchains and form a decentralized network. Users can choose the blockchain with the  technology and credibility they prefer.
Users can trade Gluwacoin for fiat currency at 1:1 fixed rate.
name: Gluwacoin
